Text: MMM... i´v just discovered that there is a huge problem trying to get this game to work under crapy windows XP, trying everything i can to solve the problem so bare with me.

Ok.. i´ve digged up some information. If you have no problems installing the game all you need to do is to download the 1.06 uk release path at http://www.volition-inc.com/fs/downloads.cfm

If you have problems with installing it go to this adress: http://www.techzonez.com/forums/archive/index.php/t-12955.html  to find some tips on how to do.

If you have any other solutions or problems please post them here and hopefully we can solve them together.

no problems under windows xp if u do the following: copy the files autoexec.nt and config.nt from your windowsrepair directory to windowssystem32.... then use the compatability mode from windows in the properties section on the set up file...there smile ;)

Yes i read that to somewere, and tried it but it didn´t work for me. Ithink it depends on xp version and system configurations. Thats why i wanted to collect different solutions so we all end up with a working game. So keep on posting different ways to get it to work. Becuse this is an awesome game that everybody should try. 

Thanks in advance

it works just fine with the uk patch, thanks SS_dominator!
and for next time I suggest converting the images to .iso format with a utility like UltraISO. these 3 images take up 250MB less space in iso format.
finaly, don't run the exe included on the silent threat cd in extras directory, it's a trojan. the game install itself is fine though.
